mapper.select:
select e.*, s.name, su.subj_name from evaluation e join student s on e.stu_no = s.stu_no join subject su on e.sub_code=substr(su.subj_code, 5)
where e.sub_code=#{subCode}
select o.subj_code, o.open_sub_code, s.subj_name from subject s join open_subj o on s.subj_code=o.subj_code where o.prof_no=#{profNo}
